name: Sagedecor
overview:
Sagedecor (also known as Williams HS Ltd) are suppliers and distributors of artificial plants, flowers, trees, foliage, Christmas decorations and general home decor. They have been trading for over 40 years.

Trade customers such as florists, garden centres, gift shops, wholesalers and home decor stores are the main customers Sagedecor supplies.

New products are constantly being added to the available range. These new products are created in reaction to current market trends ensuring there is always something new and interesting to offer their customers.

As well as distribution services Sagedecor also offer a custom design and procurement service for customers who order in large volumes. The goods are supplied from numerous factories across South East Asia. The Hong Kong office ensures high quality produce and continuous supply.

The UK office in Chapel en le Frith, Derbyshire, houses a showroom, this showcases the Sagedecor range to potential customers.

The product range is also displayed every year at trade fairs such as the Harrogate gift fair and the Spring Fair at the NEC.
